front.title: PCEP Extensions for MPLS-TE LSP Automatic Bandwidth Adjustment with stateful PCE

abstract.t: The Path Computation Element Communication Protocol (PCEP) provides mechanisms for Path Computation Elements (PCEs) to perform path computations in response to Path Computation Clients (PCCs) requests. The stateful PCE extensions provide stateful control of Multiprotocol Label Switching (MPLS) Traffic Engineering Label Switched Paths (TE LSP) via PCEP, for a model where the PCC delegates control over one or more locally configured LSPs to the PCE. This document describes the automatic bandwidth adjustment of such LSPs under the Active Stateful PCE model.
